thread.title: Madeline Canney
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Madeline Canney

author: Madeline Canney
title: Madeline Canney
text: I am halfway through the first round of BBG, and I love it. I also love that I am able to get it at an affordable price as I am a college student. I highly recommend BBG to anyone trying to get in shape.
